Government of India
Ministry of Finance
(Department of Revenue)
[Central Board of Excise and Customs]
Notification No. 57/2017 – Central Tax
New Delhi, the 15th November, 2017
G.S.R. (E):— In exercise of the powers conferred by section 148 of the Central Goods and Services
Tax Act, 2017 (12 of 2017), the Central Government, on the recommendations of the Council, notifies
the registered persons having aggregate turnover of up to 1.5 crore rupees in the preceding financial
year or the current financial year, as the class of registered persons who shall follow the special
procedure as detailed below for furnishing the details of outward supply of goods or services or both.
2. The said persons shall furnish the details of outward supply of goods or services or both in
FORM GSTR-1 effected during the quarter as specified in column (2) of the Table below till the time
period as specified in the corresponding entry in column (3) of the said Table, namely:-
Table
Sl No. Quarter for which the details in Time period for furnishing the details in FORM
FORM GSTR-1 are furnished GSTR-1
(1) (2) (3)
1 July - September, 2017 31st December, 2017
2 October - December, 2017 15th February, 2018
3 January - March, 2018 30th April, 2018
3. The special procedure or extension of the time limit for furnishing the details or return, as the case
may be, under sub-section (2) of section 38 and sub-section (1) of section 39 of the Act, for the
months of July, 2017 to March, 2018 shall be subsequently notified in the Official Gazette.
[F. No. 349/58/2017-GST(Pt.)]
(Dr.Sreeparvathy S.L.)
Under Secretary to the Government of India
